label: Makeup and Cosmetics
description: Products and tools used for enhancing or altering one's appearance, including makeup, skincare, and beauty accessories.
intents: Find the best makeup products for my skin type
Learn how to apply makeup like a professional
Discover new beauty trends and techniques
Shop for makeup and cosmetics online
Find makeup and skincare reviews and recommendations

subcategories.label: Lip Products
subcategories.description: Products used for coloring, moisturizing, and enhancing the lips.

subcategories.label: Face Products
subcategories.description: Products used for coloring, concealing, and enhancing the face.

subcategories.label: Eye Products
subcategories.description: Products used for coloring, defining, and enhancing the eyes.

subcategories.label: Skincare
subcategories.description: Products and routines used for maintaining healthy skin.

subcategories.label: Tools and Accessories
subcategories.description: Products used for applying and storing makeup and skincare products.
